title: Flag of Norway
cardDescription: The flag of Norway is a red with an indigo blue Scandinavian cross fimbriated in white that extends to the edges of the flag; the vertical part of the cross is shifted to the hoist side in the style of the Dannebrog, the flag of Denmark.
description: The flag of Norway is a red with an indigo blue Scandinavian cross fimbriated in white that extends to the edges of the flag; the vertical part of the cross is shifted to the hoist side in the style of the Dannebrog, the flag of Denmark.

content: Proportion:
Finished size:
Hook size:
14cm x 10cm
3,5 mm
Yarn:
Red (as A)
Blue (as B)
White (as C)
/crochet-pattern-images/european-flags/flag-of-norway.png

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from the middle and doing top and bottom parts separately. Also note that the starting chain is counted as row 1.

content: With B, ch 27
Sc 2nd ch from hook, sc 24, sbc, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, scb, sc 1, sbc, sc 15, sca, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, fasten off
attach C to first ch of row 1, ch 1, sc 7, scb, sc 1, sbc, sc 15, sca, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sac, scb, sc 1, sbc, sca, sc 7, turn
